full_summary:
**Title**
Dust Collector Inspection and Maintenance Services

**Ref. Number**: WS4072345613-Doc4226615754

**Issued on**: 2023-09-25

**Closes on**: 2023-10-16

**Estimated contract duration**: November 15, 2023 – March 31, 2026

**Status**: Cancelled

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) invites companies to bid for the provision of Dust Collector Inspection and Maintenance Services to the Department of National Defence (DND).

**Description**: The contract involves providing inspection and maintenance services for various dust collectors situated at DND facilities in Barrie, Ontario, and other locations across Canada.

**Contract Details**

- **Service Category**: SRV
- **Procurement Method**: Competitive – Open Bidding
- **Evaluation Criteria**: Lowest Price

**Location and Performance**

- The contract will be performed in Barrie, Ontario, and other DND facilities across Canada.
- The successful bidder will be required to maintain a high level of expertise in the inspection and maintenance of dust collectors.

**Instructions to Bidders**

- To access the solicitation, kindly visit the Ariba Discovery website at https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17536347
- All required supporting documentation and bid submissions must be submitted by October 16, 2023, at 14:00 hours EST.
- Bids received after the specified deadline will be deemed non-responsive.

**Contact Information**

For any queries or concerns, please contact:
Hannah Jeong, SPAC/PSPC
Phone: None (waiting for phone number)
Email: [hannah.jeong@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:hannah.jeong@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

Please let me know in the comments if the output meets your expectations.
